author: jta
msg: Converts all tests in autoGeneratedJdbc30.java to JUnit fixtures:
- Unlike the original test, each fixture is a standalone test, so there's no
longer a visible progression of incrementing keys like there was in the old
master. Instead, the Setup() method resets keys to 1 before each fixture is
- Runs in both embedded and client.
- An empty suite is returned if the VM doesn't support JDBC 3.0.
- Warning: the testResultSetGarbageCollection() fixture takes a noticeable
Also adds a prepareStatement(String sql, int autoGeneratedKeys) utility method
To do: remove old harness files.

author: trustin
msg: * Added a private method getSSLSessionHandler0() which returns null instead of throwing an IllegalStateException
* isSSLStarted() now uses getSSLSessionHandler0() instead of getSSLSessionHandler() to avoid IllegalStateException

author: snoopdave
msg: Added outputContentType property to to WeblogTemplate class and made UI improvements to Template Editor pages

author: jmarino
msg: assign the bootstrap classloader for marshalled components until multi-parent classloading is integrated
